sentences.cn: 忙碌而有成效的一段时间

sentences.en: He is full of [ fruitful in ] expedients .
He is really a fruitful novelist.
sentences.cn: 他真是一位多产的小说家.

sentences.en: It was a fruitful meeting; we made a lot of important decisions.
sentences.cn: 这是一次很有成效的会议, 我们做出了许多重大决定.

sentences.en: It was a fruitful meeting; we made three important decisions.
sentences.cn: 这是个卓有成效的会议, 我们作了三项重大的决定.

sentences.en: It's been positive and fruitful, but it's gone on far enough.
sentences.cn: 它是积极的和富有成效的, 但是要大家加倍努力.

sentences.en: Newton's laws were fruitful for the future development of science.
sentences.cn: 牛顿定律对其后的科学发展起了很大作用.

sentences.en: Our return with fruitful results to the city surprised them.
sentences.cn: 我们满载而归回到城里,这使他们很是惊奇.

sentences.en: Taken as a whole, the work was fruitful.
sentences.cn: 就整体而言, 这项工作是富有成果的.

sentences.en: The talks had been fruitful, but much remained to be done.
sentences.cn: 会谈卓有成效，但还有很多事情要解决。

sentences.en: The valleys to the north are more fruitful.
The work will be more fruitful under this plan.
sentences.cn: 按照这一方案,做这工作将更有成效.

sentences.en: This is perhaps the most fruitful new insight we have in the field of organization.
sentences.cn: 这也许是我们在组织领域中所获得最富有成效的新见识.

sentences.en: Today’s meeting proved more fruitful than last week’s.
sentences.cn: 事实证明今天的会议比上星期的更有成效。

sentences.en: We had a long, happy, fruitful relationship.
sentences.cn: 我们有过一段长久、愉快、双方都获益良多的关系。

words.tran_cn: 不成功的，徒劳的；不结果实的
圆润的；有果味的；果实状的
果实；结果实；[食品] 水果；成果

trans.tran_en: land that is fruitful produces a lot of crops
